projects.name: CareShare
projects.description: Secure donation platform connecting NGOs & donors (books, clothes, education, food, money).
details: Developed CareShare platform connecting NGOs with donors, streamlining donation processes for various categories including books, clothing, education, food, and monetary contributions.
Integrated secure monetary transactions using EtherJS and Ethereum blockchain, ensuring transparency and decentralization for donors' peace of mind.

projects.name: Amazon Deforestation Time Series Analysis
details: Developed a deforestation analysis tool using Google Earth Engine and the Hansen Global Forest Change dataset, providing visualizations of deforestation area, cumulative deforestation, and deforestation rate over the years in the Amazon rainforest.

Implemented complex data processing tasks including loading and visualizing geospatial data, performing pixel-wise operations, and aggregating results into meaningful metrics, contributing to environmental awareness and conservation efforts.

projects.name: Library Management System
details: Developed a Library Management application in Java with NetBeans IDE, enabling CRUD (create, read, update, delete) operations for efficient management.
Enhanced user experience by integrating search functionality, reservation status checks, and tracking issuance and return dates.

projects.name: YouText - Youtube summarizer
details: Led development of YouText, utilizing NLP & ML for concise YouTube video summaries, enhancing user experience by quick insights sans full video watch.
Implemented dual summarization strategies, abstractive & extractive, ensuring accurate & diverse summaries, evaluated via BertScore, ROUGE, & METEOR metrics for robustness.

projects.name: Zeitgeist IIT Ropar
projects.description: Spearheaded the design of Zeitgeist IIT Ropar's Cultural Fest website, resulting in a visually stunning and user-friendly experience that drove a 33% surge in visitor traffic.
details: Led the designing of a user-centric and visually captivating website for Zeitgeist IIT Ropar's Cultural Fest.
Achieved a 33% increase in visitor traffic compared to the previous year.
Collaborated closely with core team members and Zeitgeist organizers, integrating their insights and ideas to enhance user engagement and satisfaction.

projects.name: SHOPEE
projects.description: Shopee: Streamlined user login, signup, and password management with JWT for a secure and user-friendly e-commerce experience.
details: Orchestrated secure user authentication via JWT tokens and cookies, enabling streamlined login, signup, and password operations.
Implemented role-based access control, endowing administrators with elevated privileges such as product management, while affording standard users essential features, fortifying system security.

experience.description: Designed user-friendly website interfaces and engaging social media content to promote brands and drive user interaction.

Designed impactful posters for social media, promoting brand awareness, alongside pitch deck designs and article posters for enhanced engagement.
